DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effect dapsone gel female subject skin color ( Fitzpatrick Skin Types IV , V , VI ) acne vulgaris .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Dapsone Gel Females With Skin Color Acne Vulgaris
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis acne vulgaris Medium dark complexion ( Fitzpatrick Skin Type IV , V VI ) Willing avoid excessive prolong exposure face ultraviolet light ( eg , sunlight , tan bed ) throughout study Received treatment botulinum toxin serotype face within 6 month
